ConditionalPath

public ConditionalPath(int[] conditional,
                       java.lang.String target,
                       int pathvalue,
                       int concealedpathvalue)
simple constructor

Parameters:
conditional - the conditional int[] (see rewrite function)
target - the target node for this path
pathvalue - the payoff for traversing the path
concealedpathvalue - the payoff for traversing the path on a concealed tile arrangement

matches

private boolean matches(int[] sublist,
                        PointBreakdownObject points,
                        int windoftheround,
                        int playerwind)
This is the important function - it tells us whether or not something matched, allowing us to go down this conditional path

Parameters:
sublist - [MARKER, TILE[...]] list
points - the point breakdown so far
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's wind
Returns:
true if this path can be taken for this sublist

                      int[] sublist,
                      int[] mask,
                      PointBreakdownObject points,
                      int windoftheround,
                      int playerwind)
match method based on type

Parameters:
set - the tile type (see types array)
sublist - the [MARKER, TILE[...]] array
points - the string breakdown of how scoring points add up for this hand
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's wind
Returns:
true if this path can be taken based on the sublist

match

private boolean match(java.lang.String set,
                      java.lang.String type,
                      java.lang.String suitface,
                      int[] sublist,
                      int[] mask,
                      PointBreakdownObject points,
                      int windoftheround,
                      int playerwind)
match method based on type, face and suit

Parameters:
set - the tile type (see types array)
type - the tile face (see faces array)
suitface - the tile suit (see suits array)
sublist - the [MARKER, TILE[...]] array
points - the string breakdown of how scoring points add up for this hand
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's wind
Returns:
true if this path can be taken based on the sublist

matchConditionalPath

public boolean matchConditionalPath(int[] sublist,
                                    int[] mask,
                                    int windoftheround,
                                    int playerwind)
matching method for conditional paths, used in the dFSA system

Parameters:
sublist - the tileset sublist
mask - the matching mask
windoftheround - the wind of the round
playerwind - the player's own wind
Returns:
true if match, false if not
